column2: select _id, cast (ASSAULT as integer) + cast (BURGLARY as integer) + cast (LARCENY as integer) + cast (ARSON as integer) + cast (THEFT as integer) + cast (WEAPSCH as integer) + cast (KIDNAPPING as integer) + cast (HOMICIDE as integer) + cast (DRUGS as integer) + cast (ROBBERY as integer) + cast (RAPE as integer) + cast (SEXCRIMES as integer) + cast (WEAPONS as integer) + cast (VIOLENT as integer) + cast (PROPERTY as integer) + cast (DRUG as integer) + cast (OTHER as integer) as tot from crimes) select tot, count (*) as num from a group by tot
